QuestData.Title: His Heart Must Be In It
QuestData.Description: <The gnomecorder clicks.>$B$BHis gear alone won't be enough, $n. His heart must also be in this battle. To capture that, we need items of sentimental value. The Blackrock orcs of Render's Camp, located in the north, hold two such items that belong to Keeshan.$B$BGet up there and search their coffers for Keeshan's headband and a jade amulet left to him by his wife - who was brutally killed during a Blackrock orc invasion.$B$BBring them back to me should you succeed.
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover Keeshan's Red Headband and Keeshan's Jade Amulet.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you locate the headband and amulet?
QuestData.RewardText: I hope with these items and with his crew all rescued he'll have a change of heart. We can't do this without Keeshan.
